Subjects: carols, of religious counsel; Adam, creation and fall of
_description: A song of the Creation and Fall of Adam — eight quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Now bething the gentilman / How Adam dalf and Eue sp[an]’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
In the vale of abrahamCryst hymself he made
                    adam…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Ther was adam sore aferdFor labour coude he werkyn
                    non
